programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear) S2 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear»Paddington helps to hatch an egg but it takes ages & when it finally cracks open, he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Rides a Scooteer) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Paddington Rides a Scooteer»Paddington, Jonathan & Judy play imaginary games and Judy and Mateo decide they might have more fun playing with them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (En route pour la savane !) S6 (n°28)
programme.desc: «En route pour la savane !»The Big Rig Bandit!: When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! (S6, ep 16).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (14/18)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le grand trésor des pirates / Des bananes en or) S1 (12/21)
programme.desc: «Le grand trésor des pirates / Des bananes en or»When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Under the Pirate Moon) S1 (n°20)
programme.desc: «Under the Pirate Moon»Under the Pirate Moon: It's a nighttime chase above and below the sea when Escarlata turns the moon into a fish. (S1, ep 20b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La partie du lundi) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La partie du lundi»Monday Funday: The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion. (S2, ep 3b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Snap Pea Stir-Fry: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own. (S1, ep 5b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington passe au vert) S2 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington passe au vert»Paddington Goes Green: Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy? (S2, ep 14b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le concours d'animaux) S4 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le concours d'animaux»There is a pet competition at playgroup, and everyone has brought in their pets. Dr Hamster is the judge, but finds it hard to choose the best pet.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toile d'araignée) S4 (22/52)
programme.desc: «La toile d'araignée»Peppa, George and Mummy Pig are in Daddy Pig's study, and they see that it is a complete mess and full of spider webs. They see a spider, which Peppa names Mister Skinnylegs, but Mummy Pig is afraid and tells Daddy Pig to get rid of it. They set out to find a new home for Mister Skinnylegs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Une nuit mouvementée) S4 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Une nuit mouvementée»Peppa's family are staying at Cousin Chloe's house. After a long day everyone is tired and wants to go to sleep. But baby Alexander's crying is keeping everyone awake!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Ron's Sunburn) S1 (55/78)
programme.desc: «Ron's Sunburn»Ron has gotten a terrible sunburn and is too embarrassed to come outside and play with his friends. They try everything they can think of to get him to play with them. They even try tempting him with Froga's freshly baked cookies!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Le portrait de Bubu) S1 (56/78)
programme.desc: «Le portrait de Bubu»Anna is painting a beautiful portrait of Bubu as a gift. She leaves the painting in the meadow for a moment. Meanwhile, Christopher discovers the abandoned painting.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Un super moment avec Blue) S3 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Un super moment avec Blue»Tickety's Big Musical Morning!: Good Morning! We celebrate morning routines with Tickety as we sing a brand-new wakeup song and work out what special time is coming up. (S3, ep 11).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican) S8 (17/24)
programme.desc: «La forteresse en carton / L'île de Bill le grand pélican»When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save A Sand Sculpture Contest) S9 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Pups Save A Sand Sculpture Contest»Pups Save a Sand Sculpture Contest: When Mayor Humdinger tries to cheat at the Adventure Bay sand sculpture contest, his machine goes out-of-control. (S9, ep 5b).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup) S2 (5/20)
programme.desc: «La perruque du pouvoir / Le canard qui trompétait au loup»Steel Tower is under new management not once but twice - can the Deer Squad return it to a distraught Sir Steel? // Steel and Lady Fluffpot are putting up a play. Ian's false alarms frustrate Kai, but one of them turns out to be a REAL emergency!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !) S2 (1/20)
programme.desc: «Au pied de l'arc-en-ciel / Grillés !»The search for gold at the end of the rainbow leads the Deer Squad to an amazing Frost Mountain and a new deer friend! // The Deer Squad have to deal with a cheesy situation thanks to Sir Steel's latest invention - The Giant Toaster!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave) S2 (15/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Saves the Bees / Paddington & the Heat Wave»Paddington learns about bees & decides to help them make honey by planting a flower garden but someone thinks they're weeds! // There's a heatwave in Windsor Gardens & Mateo has sold out of ice-creams so he and Paddington create a new flavor!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange) S1 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le plus tendre des liens / L'empire orange»While the family makes pottery, Barbabravo and Barbabright try to set the world record for the largest cheese soufflé. // The Barbapapas decide to go to the park. While her brother and sisters play , Barbalib can't help to control everything.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La partie du lundi) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La partie du lundi»Monday Funday: The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion. (S2, ep 3b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon) S1 (n°21)
programme.desc: «La Reine des farces / La citronnade du lagon»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Magic Trick) S1 (57/78)
programme.desc: «The Magic Trick»Magic Trick: Anna and Christopher are amazed by Ron's magic trick! When Ron teaches Anna how to be a magician, she wants to make Christopher disappear! (S1, ep 57).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Go Find it!) S1 (n°58)
programme.desc: «Go Find it!»Go Find It!: Today, Christopher organises the game of the day. He lists objects that his friends must bring back, and the first team who does will win the game. (S1, ep 58).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Strawberries) S1 (1/78)
programme.desc: «Strawberries»Anna and Froga are excited to make the best strawberry pie ever with the first strawberries of the season. Anna makes a plan to distract Christopher while they make the pie!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (2/78)
programme.desc: «The Swing»The Swing: When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing! (S1, ep 2).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Detectives) S1 (3/78)
programme.desc: «The Detectives»Froga is desperate. Her favourite toy Super Pebble has disappeared! Now Anna and Ron work with Froga play detectives. Thanks to a thoughtful gift from Christopher, Froga ends up finding her missing Super stone herself!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Super Christophe) S1 (4/78)
programme.desc: «Super Christophe»Christopher visits Anna with his " Super Christopher" costume, ready for adventure! But being a superhero comes with a whole set of challenges. Christopher isn't just a superhero. He's also a super friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le puits à souhaits) S4 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Le puits à souhaits»Granny Pig places a large order of plastic gnomes and a wishing well for the garden, Peppa and George love them but Grandpa Pig is not happy. He wishes they would all disappear!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle) S4 (26/52)
programme.desc: «La fête d'adieu de madame Gazelle»Madame Gazelle announces that she is leaving the playgroup. The children are very sad to lose their favourite teacher, so they decide to throw her a leaving party.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La reine) S4 (27/52)
programme.desc: «La reine»La reine va remettre une récompense à mademoiselle Rabbit, la personne la plus travailleuse de tout le pays. Peppa et ses amis décident de l'accompagner.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'île déserte) S4 (28/52)
programme.desc: «L'île déserte»Peppa and George are at Danny Dog's house and Captain Dog is telling the kids stories of the time when he was a sailor. He declares that he will never step on a boat again. Grandad Dog, Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit are going on a fishing trip and the Captain refuses to join them. But the three of them get lost at sea because no one is steering the boat. They get stranded on a desert island, so Captain Dog has no choice but to get on a boat to save them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Travailler et s'amuser) S3 (1/52)
programme.desc: «Travailler et s'amuser»Peppa et Suzy comprennent que les adultes doivent travailler toute la journée. Elles font alors semblant de travailler dans une boutique à la garderie et trouvent cette tâche épuisante...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'arc en ciel) S3 (2/52)
programme.desc: «L'arc en ciel»Peppa and her family are on holiday in their trailer van. They decide to go to Duck Land, a special park where they can see the ducks in the river, and are surprised when they learn that their van can convert into a boat!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La toux de Pedro) S3 (3/52)
programme.desc: «La toux de Pedro»Pedro gets a contagious cough at daycare and some of the other children soon catch it. When it's time to go the grown-ups catch it too, including Madame Gazelle. Peppa calls Doctor Brown Bear who gives them terrible-tasting medicine, but who will look after him when he is sick?

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (From One Pit to Another) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «From One Pit to Another»The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand) S1 (38/52)
programme.desc: «L'herbe est toujours plus verte ailleurs / Quand je serai grand»Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Amis à grande vitesse) S3 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Amis à grande vitesse»Blaze and Pegwheel the Pirate have teamed up for the ultimate treasure hunt! Together they must find three keys to unlock a special chest. But Crusher's sailing the high seas too, and he'll do anything to get the treasure first!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (La chasse aux outils) S1 (4/20)
programme.desc: «La chasse aux outils»Gabby is the mechanic all the Monster Machines in town count on to fix them up. But when Crusher steals all her tools, Gabby needs Blaze's help to get them back!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand) S9 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Pups Save the Hatchlings / Pups Save a Wrongway Farmhand»When Mayor Humdinger decides to make the world's biggest omelet, he accidentally orders the wrong kind of eggs - ones that hatch. // Traveling Travis volunteers to watch Farmer Yumi and Farmer Al's Farm and characteristically messes up everything.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost) S9 (12/25)
programme.desc: «Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch / Pups Save a Lonely Ghost»Pups Stop the Return of Humsquatch: When Eddie and Emmy get impatient at the carnival, they hide in Mayor Humdinger's Humsquatch costume to chase everyone out. (S9, ep 12a).

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue) S2 (2/20)
programme.desc: «Muffin dans l'espace / Une limonade qui secoue»Sir Steel catapults all his old junk into space - but suddenly realises Muffin is in there too! He needs Deer Squad's help to bring her home. // Bobbi's super fizzy drink ends up creating bubbly burpy havoc across Platinum City!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Wheel of Steel) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Wheel of Steel»Some changes to the design of Kai's big Ferris wheel, that Sir Steel makes don't go quite the way he thought they would!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over) S2 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Visits the Doctor / Paddington and the Sleep Over»Paddington hurts his knee & goes to see Dr Yasmin. When she steps out, he steps UP and is mistaken for a doctor. // Can Mr. Brown's sleepover live up to Mrs. Brown's high standard when Simi and Toq come to stay for the night?

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear) S2 (26/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Hatching Surprise / Paddington the Best Bear»Paddington helps to hatch an egg but it takes ages & when it finally cracks open, he gets a real surprise! // Paddington wishes he could have been at Mr. & Mrs. Brown's wedding after seeing some photos, so they decide to do it all again!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes) S1 (9/52)
programme.desc: «Papa Pig a perdu ses lunettes»Papa Pig is a bit cranky because he lost his glasses. Peppa and George are going to look for him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le jardinage) S1 (10/52)
programme.desc: «Le jardinage»Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le hoquet) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Le hoquet»George gets hiccups when he drinks his juice too quickly, so Peppa tries to cure him.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les vélos) S1 (12/52)
programme.desc: «Les vélos»Daddy Pig has grown a large pumpkin. Peppa is cycling, but she wants to cycle without training wheels so she bumps accidentaly into the pumpkin.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (En route pour la savane !) S6 (n°28)
programme.desc: «En route pour la savane !»The Big Rig Bandit!: When reckless hyena Spotty steals young elephant Eli from the savanna, Wildlife Rangers Zooli and Goby hop into their big rig to rescue him! (S6, ep 16).

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel) S3 (14/18)
programme.desc: «Le Petit Chaperon Arc-en-ciel»Rainbow Puppy's opening up a brand-new Neighborhood Theater and everyone's pitching in to help. But who has the singing and dancing talents to play the part of The Big, Bad Wolf ?"" We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Les Rythmes de Blue) S2 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Les Rythmes de Blue»Josh starts a band and uses Blue's Clues to find out which instrument Blue wants to play.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le grand trésor des pirates / Des bananes en or) S1 (12/21)
programme.desc: «Le grand trésor des pirates / Des bananes en or»When Bonnie Bones steals a chest of pirate treasures, Santiago learns just how much he needs his crew. // Santi and crew navigate the tricky Banana Island to save a baby monkey and its treasure from Enrique.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Le pinceau magique) S2 (n°6)
programme.desc: «Le pinceau magique»When Escarlata puts a spell on the brushes of a visiting Pirate Painter, Santi and crew must save the town.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La partie du lundi) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La partie du lundi»Monday Funday: The Sharks compete in a series of games to see which of them is the Monday Funday Chomp-ion. (S2, ep 3b).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Snap Pea Stir-Fry) S1 (n°5)
programme.desc: «Snap Pea Stir-Fry»Snap Pea Stir-Fry: Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own. (S1, ep 5b).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf) S9 (n°15)
programme.desc: «Pups Save a T-Rex Tyke / Pups Save a Playful Elephant Calf»When a baby T-Rex gets lost, Ryder and the pups go on a daring mission to the Dino Wilds to help find him. // When Everest joins the Paw Patrol for a visit to the jungle, she makes friends with a clumsy elephant calf and then must help rescue him.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington passe au vert) S2 (14/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington passe au vert»Paddington Goes Green: Paddington learns all about composting thanks to Mr. Mulch, but will he grow flowers in time for Aunt Lucy? (S2, ep 14b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le petit bateau) S4 (33/52)
programme.desc: «Le petit bateau»The Little Boat: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le Bac à Sable) S4 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le Bac à Sable»Peppa and her friends are busy building a desert island in a sandpit. They are all very proud of it, with its forest, lake, houses, and shops.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les animaux nocturnes) S4 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Les animaux nocturnes»Every day is an adventure for Peppa Pig! With her family and friends there's always something to smile about, and a whole world of things to discover!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Stay Over) S1 (n°59)
programme.desc: «The Stay Over»When Anna and Froga invite Ron to take a nap on their couch, they are surprised by his loud snores. They try everything to get him to stop, without disturbing his nap.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Snow Dream) S1 (n°60)
programme.desc: «Snow Dream»Bubu has fixed Froga's barometer and everyone is surprised when it says there will be snow today (on a warm summer day!). Everyone is excited, Bubu wants to make to make a five-seater sled! He gets upset, when they realize it was a false forecast!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Barba TV / Le muséum) S1 (43/52)
programme.desc: «Barba TV / Le muséum»The barbababies are glued to the TV. Since they love it so much, their parents encourage them to make their own shows. // The Barbapapa visit the museum of evolution. On the program: creation of the Earth, Precambrian submarine and... dinosaurs!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La crise de rire de Magenta) S3 (11/18)
programme.desc: «La crise de rire de Magenta»Josh and Blue are pretending to be doctors around the house, giving silly checkups to friends, but one "patient" seems to have a curious condition. We'll play Blue's Clues to help find the cure!

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Rubble and Wild and a Yarn Ball! / Skye and Rory Flip It / Marshall, Leo and a Ferris Wheel / Everest, Shade and the Mountain Goat) S8 (n°25)
programme.desc: «Rubble and Wild and a Yarn Ball! / Skye and Rory Flip It / Marshall, Leo and a Ferris Wheel / Everest, Shade and the Mountain Goat»Rubble and Wild rescue animals from a giant runaway ball of yarn. / Skye and Rory rescue a painter hanging from a scaffold. / Marshall and Leo rescue animals stuck on a Ferris Wheel./ Everest and Shade rescue a baby mountain goat stuck in a crevasse.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?) S2 (n°207)
programme.desc: «La course aux rebonds / Qu'est-ce qui ne va pas, Lola ?»It's Deer Squad to the rescue when Stu and Safia bounce off to space on their super bouncy mega trampolines./ A bad mood crystal causes Lola and many animals to become unusually grumpy!Jade has to help Deer Squad to restore joy around Central Forest.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !) S2 (3/20)
programme.desc: «Perruque en fuite / Ça tourne !»When Sir Steel's high-tech wig malfunctions and goes on the rampage in Platinum City the Deer Squad race to the rescue. // The Deer Squad must think fast to save Lady Fluffpot when Sir Steel's filming turns into a Disaster Movie!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy) S2 (20/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington's Treasure Hunt / Paddington's Taste of Italy»Jonathan & Paddington find a treasure map in a bottle on the lake! Judy & Toq also find a treasure map, but who will find the treasure first? // Mr. Gruber has always wanted to go to Italy & Paddington sets about helping his friend achieve his dream!

programme.title: Mini Chef (Pizza) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Pizza»

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle) S1 (6/52)
programme.desc: «It's Only a Mystery... / The Battle»Taking after his favourite detective, Barbabravo looks for a case to solve. Can he solve the mystery of the missing ice statue? // Inspired by their favourite heroes, the Barbababies make costumes. But no heroes are possible without villains...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize / Marvelous Moustaches»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another. // Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le gobelin farceur) S2 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le gobelin farceur»Goldie's reputation as a great party hostess is on the line when she forgets to buy treats for her guests.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse) S1 (n°22)
programme.desc: «La méduse égarée / Corail en détresse»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Echange de rôles) S1 (63/78)
programme.desc: «Echange de rôles»Switcheroo: When Froga and Anna realize they have switched mugs in the morning, they decide to make a day out of it and Switcheroo Day is born.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (La chaussette disparue) S1 (64/78)
programme.desc: «La chaussette disparue»When Froga realizes her socks are smelly after a day of gardening, Bubu offers to help by placing them into his Smell Better Machine.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (5/78)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (We Love Nature) S1 (6/78)
programme.desc: «We Love Nature»Anna and her friends are planning an amazing picnic in nature. But Bubu's bag is too heavy, Christophe can't resist eating all the strawberries! (S1, ep 6).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Kite) S1 (7/78)
programme.desc: «The Kite»While Anna and Froga are playing with their kite, it gets stuck in the tree. Anna and Froga race to Ron's for help, but when the three friends arrive at the apple tree, their kite and all the apples are missing!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Nap) S1 (8/78)
programme.desc: «The Nap»The Nap: Anna and her friends decide they should all take a nap to be in shape for their midnight pyjama party, but no one knows the best way to get to sleep! (S1, ep 8).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (En bateau) S4 (43/52)
programme.desc: «En bateau»Going Boating: Everyone has come to the lake to go boating, and have a race.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le magasin de porcelaine) S4 (44/52)
programme.desc: «Le magasin de porcelaine»While enjoying a tea break, Mr Bull accidentally breaks his delicate teapot. He takes the pieces to Miss Rabbit in the hope that she can mend it.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les fruits) S4 (45/52)
programme.desc: «Les fruits»Fruit: It is fruit day at the supermarket, and Miss Rabbit is making fruit smoothies.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le ballon de George) S4 (46/52)
programme.desc: «Le ballon de George»Peppa and Suzy have nothing to do, and are bored. Daddy Pig finds them an old box of garden games to play with. But not all the games are easy for little George.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La bibliothèque) S3 (4/52)
programme.desc: «La bibliothèque»Peppa and her family go to the Windy Castle, and when they get there, they have a wonderful view from the top.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread) S1 (2/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread»Making Bread: Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned. (S1, ep 4a).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres) S1 (19/52)
programme.desc: «Les Barbapapa des cavernes / Les petits monstres»The barbababies discover a strange cave. Barbalib tells the story of the caves Barbapapa and how they transformed. // The Barbababies have a sleepover in the living room. Fearing the monsters in the closet, they set up wacky traps to catch them.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (À bas la triche) S3 (n°19)
programme.desc: «À bas la triche»It's the second ever Team Truck Challenge - a big race that pairs trucks together in racing teams. And this time Blaze's teammate is...Crusher?! Will Crusher be able to resist his cheating ways to win for the very first time?

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Le Malfaiteur Mystérieux) S1 (12/20)
programme.desc: «Le Malfaiteur Mystérieux»After a win at the Dome, Blaze meets one of his biggest fans: Ferris. Moments later, the steel trophy won by Blaze and AJ suddenly disappeared. However, the mysterious bandit turns out to be Ferris.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse) S8 (21/24)
programme.desc: «Le concours de danse / Une pieuvre farceuse»A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux) S8 (23/24)
programme.desc: «Le cygne gonflable / Le lav'animaux»The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué) S2 (4/20)
programme.desc: «Une pluie de peluches / Le bal masqué»Jade's first sleepover is an eventful occasion when Stu & Safia make it rain teddies across the city and Central Forest! // Sir Steel is put out when he discovers he's not been invited to Lady Fluffpot's party but the Deer Squad are.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (n°16)
programme.desc: «Le bongo de Bobbi»Bobbi and Ian's musical talents are recognized but if they go on a world Tour, what will happen to the Deer Squad?
